<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108282</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108282</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101429</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">New Skin - Partners Video Magazine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Neue Haut - Partner-Bildschirm-Zeitschrift</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nouvelle Peau - Magasin de Vidéo d'Associés</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pele Nova - Compartimento Do Vídeo Dos Sócios</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nuova Pelle - Scomparto Del Video Dei Soci</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Νέο δέρμα - τηλεοπτικό περιοδικό συνεργατών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Piel Nueva - Compartimiento Del Vídeo De los 
Socios</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Scientists in Illinois are using corn protein to create new skin and deliver medicine through nanotubes. New Skin is a segment from Partners Video Magazine's latest episode, The Science of Small. To view the entire episode visit: http://www.csrees.usda.gov/newsroom/partners/partners.html</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaftler in Illinois benutzen Maisprotein, 
um neue Haut herzustellen und Medizin durch nanotubes zu liefern. 
Neue Haut ist ein Segment von der neuesten Episode der 
Partner-videozeitschrift, die Wissenschaft von kleinem. Den 
gesamten Episodebesuch ansehen: 
http://www.csrees.usda.gov/newsroom/partners/partners.html</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les scientifiques en Illinois emploient la 
protéine de maïs pour créer la nouvelle peau et pour fournir la 
médecine par des nanotubes. La nouvelle peau est un segment 
épisode du magazine visuel d'associés du dernier, la Science de 
petit. Pour visualiser la visite entière d'épisode : 
http://www.csrees.usda.gov/newsroom/partners/partners.html</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os cientistas em Illinois estão usando a proteína
do milho criar a pele nova e entregar a medicina através dos 
nanotubes. A pele nova é um segmento do episode o mais atrasado
do compartimento video dos sócios, a ciência de pequeno. Para 
ver a visita inteira do episode: 
http://www.csrees.usda.gov/newsroom/partners/partners.html</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli scienziati nell'Illinois stanno usando la 
proteina del cereale per creare la nuova pelle e per trasportare la 
medicina attraverso i nanotubes. La nuova pelle è un segmento 
episodio del video scomparto dei soci dall'ultimo, la scienza di 
piccolo. Per osservare l'intera chiamata di episodio: 
http://www.csrees.usda.gov/redazione/partners/partners.html</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι επιστήμονες στο Ιλλινόις χρησιμοποιούν την 
πρωτεϊ'νη καλαμποκιού για να δημιουργήσουν το νέο δέρμα και να 
παραδώσουν την ιατρική μέσω των nanotubes. Το νέο δέρμα 
είναι ένα τμήμα μνήμης από το πιό πρόσφατο επεισόδιο του 
τηλεοπτικού περιοδικού συνεργατών, η επιστήμη μικρού. Για 
να εμφανίσει την ολόκληρη επίσκεψη επεισοδίου: http://www.csrees.usda.gov/αίθουσα τύπου/partners/partners.html</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los científicos en Illinois están utilizando la 
proteína del maíz para crear la piel nueva y para entregar la 
medicina a través de nanotubes. La piel nueva es un segmento 
del episodio más último del compartimiento video de los socios, la 
ciencia de pequeño. Para visión la visita entera del episodio:
http://www.csrees.usda.gov/redacción/partners/partners.html</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
